name: Moons of True Magic - Ep 0
description:
MOTM is a classic JRPG, heavy focused on story line, puzzle and combat. The game has been influenced by many, many RPG´s but you will also find a lot of originality in regards of story and concept design. 

The game will be divided into 6 chapters, the first of which is titled "Foreign Swords" and functions as a Demo Prologue.

Meet Bree, Teotl and Kieran, a trio of unlikely allies that have entered The Red Pit, united by the search of a special type of beast.  The trio appears to struggle in getting  along, yet nothing will stand on their way  to conquer the beast.

* Clever narrative direction.
* Custom and beautiful art.
* Professional voice acting.
* Strategic combat.
* Character skin system.
